description:
Automate your patch management

Update third-party software, deploy custom scripts, and make impactful configuration changes to your on-prem Windows devices in minutes with PDQ Deploy.
Changes/Improvements
- Added measures to decrease chances of hitting a rate limit.

Bug Fixes
- Fixed display issue with outline when using Virtual Desktops
- Inventory: Updated BitLocker Protection status to directly report from WMI
- Inventory: Fixed error when duplicating tools in nested folders
- Inventory: Corrected issue with daily trigger for auto-reports
- Inventory: Fix issue with duplicate message in Add Console User Access Warning
